name: ⌾
description:
⌾ is a video game about relationship between home and the residents. 
You play the home. 
You have to be a safe place for your human, animal, whatever friend.
But you are only a home, and you don't always know what's best for them.

A game by Neha Hassanbay, Paul Defois, Marianne Vieulès, Nicolas Leray & Paul Kessel
